item.title: EKC SILVER 35.4 HAS BEEN RELEASED 9-24-19. I HAVE CHANGED THE DEFAULT TO THE SCRUBS FOR MOVIES AND GREASED LIGHTNING FOR SHOWS. NFL SECTIONS HAVE BEEN ADDED AS WELL. THE SELECTOR CAN STILL BE USED ANYWHERE HOWEVER, AS I KNOW IT WAS VERY POPULAR WITH A LOT OF YOU. SIMPLY PRESS AND HOLD SELECT ON ANY MEDIA ANYWHERE AND SELECT OPENMETA CHOOSE PLAYER. INSIDE THESE OPTIONS IVE ALSO ADDED THE CREW AS A 5TH OPTION. IT IS A VERY GOOD ONE AND HIGHLY RECOMMENDED

EKC TV IS ONLY $12.50 A MONTH. WE ARE RELEASING EKCTV PREMIUM THAT HAS 3000 MORE CHANNELS AND VOD FOR $25 A MONTH VERY SOON. EKC TV APP IS NO LONGER WORKING. YOU NEED TO DOWNLOAD THE TEMPORARY APP TO CONTINUE YOUR SERVICE. ALL RECURRING PAYMENTS WERE STOPPED A FEW DAYS AGO. TO CONTINUE SERVICE GO TO ELITEKUSTOMCONFIG.COM/EKCTV AND RESIGN BACK UP ONCE YOUR SUB EXPIRES PLEASE. SORRY FOR THE INCOVIENENCE.
EKC TV IS LIVE AND WORKING AMAZINGLY. IF YOU WOULD LIKE A CABLE LIKE EXPERIENCE WITH EVERY CHANNEL, SPORTING PACKAGE, AND LOCAL NEWS, GO TO ELITEKUSTOMCONFIG.COM NOW AND SIGN UP!.
